lexUnit.name: immoral.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: not conforming to accepted standards of morality

sentence.text: She was mischievous , aggressive , and totally immoral .
This is both unjust and totally immoral .

It 's immoral for lawyers to take advantage of people 's grief this way .
